body_html:
@vyse8 It appears you have no dependency remaining on the nativeBuildRule, so I'm not sure why you would be getting this bazel error. Are you sure you didn't change the build.gradle file after you got this error?

Also, if you were building with bazel on Windows, you wouldn't be able to simply change bazel to bash and have it work. You'd need to do something similar to the workaround with the helper script in my comment above.

body:
@vyse8 It appears you have no dependency remaining on the nativeBuildRule, so I'm not sure why you would be getting this bazel error. Are you sure you didn't change the build.gradle file after you got this error?

Also, if you were building with bazel on Windows, you wouldn't be able to simply change bazel to bash and have it work. You'd need to do something similar to the workaround with the helper script in my comment above.
